title: Trying to find an Indian music video shot in a car, a la James Corden
selftext:
I'm trying to find a music video. It's in Hindi, maybe a bit of Punjabi. It was shot in a car, a la James Corden. The singer has a beard, maybe is wearing black sunglasses, and there's a few men in the car dancing along. The entire video is shot in the car. The singer's name is one word, something like Asroor, but not that. I think it starts with an 'A'.

I can't remember much of the song. It's not too fast/loud and maybe there's a guitar in the car.

Some people pointed out that the singer looks like a Pakistani singer, and then they collaborated on a song which the Pakistani singer shot in a car in Pakistan. That has a disclaimer about how the Indian singer couldn't get a visa to Pakistan.

Edit: Solved! [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RHszWAPkipA](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RHszWAPkipA)
comments: All Punjabi music videos are in a car, be more specific. Hum the tune of a some lyrics

This is all I remember, sorry. All Punjabi music videos aren't followed by a collaboration with a Pakistani lookalike---if someone's familiar with the song, I imagine this would be enough to know it's what I'm talking about.
There’s a Pakistan singer named Asrar, he’s the singer of Afghan Jalebi Ya Baba in Phantom, check his YouTube channel if the song you are looking for is by him?
